Blog.post: Many of you are wondering what WoPS and rogues is, Rogues, An rpg about Elements and Magicians. WoPS, The Sequel to Rogues, Not released anywhere except in cambridge, Massachusetts by the first 5 chosen ones(Cambridge only), Jasper(Leader), Water and Ice Javon, Physical Cody, Fire Soo-Hwan(Co-Leader), Earth Gregory, Wind.

You may know me from Darkenedskylight.blogspot.com , my more casual blog, this blog, however is made to answer almost any question you have about certain games, and/or Rogues, My original Rpg which I play with friends. You may or may not know who or what I am. I am a dedicated waterrogue, I am a lvl 10 magician on everquest(soon to become higher but those posts will be on darkenedskylight) I am a lvl 51 Wizard/Paladin on Runescape(soon to be higher) and I am one of the 6 founders of WoPS and Rogues . All questions post here or Send an email to me at urlLink Jkozak32@aol.com and I will respond promptly, if I am out of the area It may take roughly a week but, no worries, I'll get back to you. Chosen one of Ice and Water, Jasper P.S. If you know me in real life and play Rogues//WoPS post Chosen one of [Your element], [Your name]

Freeze Icy breath Tidal wave Evaporate Atlantia Portal Summon ice Summon water Hail Rain Storm Limited Telekinetics Limited Psionics Mastered Healing Mastered Divination Mastered Conjuration Mastered Evocation

The wind tugs his Blue hair slightly to the side but his Piercing blue-black eyes kept focused on his target, A dragon whelp. He picked his staff up and waved it at the dragon, The tiny orb at the edge of the staff sparkled and A giant wave of water appeared behind him. "Too bad I didn't get to know him very well..." He said, Flipping into the air and making a surfboard out of ice.He hopped on the board and landed on the wave. The dragon cried out in a moan of defeat and Evaporated into a gust of smoke just as the water hit him. In the smoke a small Crystal appeared and he jumped up to grab it. The crystal shimmered in his hand and put it in his robe pocket."Deera's crystal.1 down, 2 to go.And then I can Learn how to summon, A GREAT ELEMENTAL!!!!"
